text: Andhara babe kono aparaadha na'i, khanjara babe kono aparaadha na'i arau asustha lokara babe'o kono aparaadha na'i; arau yiye allaha arau te'omra raachulara anugatya karaiba, te'om taka enekuraa jannatata praraesa karaaba, yara talata nadisamuha prabahita; kintu yiye prstha pradarsana karaiba te'om taka yantranadayaka sasti diba
